location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Captain C J Maillard, commanding the Honourable Company's Cruiser (HCC) Amherst

mods.abstract: Stannus requests permission for the Assistant Surgeon of the Amherstto attend to the sick at the Residency until the arrival of Mr Johnson, who had been appointed by Government to deputise for James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon at the Residency, during Riach's absence in the interior with Lieutenant-Colonel John Macdonald.
